Class Square

java.lang.Object
shapes.Shape
shapes.Square
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locatable
public class Square extends Shape implements Locatable
Represents a square shape with a location and side length.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Square()
    Constructs a default Square with side length 1.0, white color, and location (0, 0).
    Square(double sideLength, Color color, Point location)
    Constructs a Square with the specified side length, color, and location.
    Square(Square other)
    Constructs a copy of the given Square.

  • Constructor Details

    • Square

      public Square()
      Constructs a default Square with side length 1.0, white color, and location (0, 0).

    • Square

      public Square(double sideLength, Color color, Point location)
      Constructs a Square with the specified side length, color, and location.
      Parameters:
      sideLength - the length of the square's sides
      color - the color of the square
      location - the location of the square
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if sideLength is not finite or invalid input: '<' 0, or location is null

    • Square

      public Square(Square other)
      Constructs a copy of the given Square.
      Parameters:
      other - the Square to copy
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if other is null
